blockchain.name: EVM Conditions
blockchain.desc: So much maths... You need to find the value, in hex, that you need to send to make the contract STOP and not self destruct. Wrap the hex in n00bz{}. If the correct answer is 9999, the flag is n00bz{0x270f}. Author: NoobMaster

blockchain.name: EVM The Basics
blockchain.desc: I have some EVM runtime bytecode, whatever that means. You need to find the value, in hex, that you need to send to make the contract STOP and not self destruct. Wrap the hex in n00bz{}. If the correct answer is 9999, the flag is n00bz{0x270f}. Author: NoobMaster

blockchain.name: Shop
blockchain.desc: Welcome to the Shop! Just buy the flag for 1337 ETH! Too bad you don't have enough... Note: It is best to deploy your contract through web3 python module (I believe js should also work but have not tested it). Author: NoobMaster

crypto.name: RSA
crypto.desc: The cryptography category is incomplete without RSA. So here is a simple RSA challenge. Have fun! Author: noob_abhinav

crypto.name: Random
crypto.desc: I hid my password behind an impressive sorting machine. The machine is very luck based, or is it?!?!?!? Author: Connor Chang

crypto.name: Vinegar
crypto.desc: Can you decode this message? Note: Wrap the decrypted text in n00bz{}. Author: noob_abhinav

crypto.name: Vinegar 2
crypto.desc: Never limit yourself to only alphabets! Author: NoobMaster

forensic.name: Plane
forensic.desc: So many plane-related challenges! Why not another one? The flag is the latitude, longitude of the place this picture is taken from, rounded upto two decimal places. Example: n00bz{55.51,-20.27}. Author: NoobMaster Author: NoobMaster

forensic.name: Wave
forensic.desc: The Wave is not audible, perhaps corrupted? Note: Wrap the flag in n00bz{}. There are no spaces in the flag and it is all lowercase. Author: NoobMaster

misc.name: Addition
misc.desc: My little brother is learning math, can you show him how to do some addition problems? Author: Connor Chang

misc.name: Subtraction
misc.desc: My little brother is learning math, can you show him how to do some subtraction problems? Author: Connor Chang

misc.name: WaaS
misc.desc: Writing as a Service! Author: NoobMaster + NoobHacker

osint.name: Pastebin
osint.desc:
Just go to my pastebin which was created long time back.
Important!

There have been some changes to this challenge due things outside our control (like deletion of the pastebin). The above description is still valid (and so is the original info), but you will need the new info to solve the challenge now. Challenge is still solvable. Author: noob_abhinav

Note:- https://pastebin.com/u/abhinav654321 New info:- https://pastebin.com/j1UnKA7m

osint.name: PastebinX
osint.desc:
All I need is the User ID said the boss. Help the poor employee to find the id. Flag format - n00bz{1d_}. If id is "hhjkh876897" then flag will be n00bz{1d_hhjkh876897}. Author: noob_abhinav

Note - see Pastebin for name

osint.name: Tail
osint.desc: Here's a picture of a plane's tail. Can you find the airline's hub (the airport where they mostly operate from). Use the three letter airport IATA code and wrap it in n00bz{}. Example: n00bz{SFO}. Author: NoobMaster

osint.name: The Gang
osint.desc: John Doe has been suspected of creating a gang. The members of team n00bzUnit3d also seem associated with it. Can you find out if John Doe has recently joined the team? You might find what you are looking for ;) P.S.: The team website might help. Author: NoobMaster

osint.name: The Gang 2
osint.desc: You may have gotten your first flag, but it's just the beginning! John Doe, as overconfident as he is, has left you with a riddle. Maybe it hides some secrets? Continue where you left off last time. Flag will already by wrapped in n00bz{} Author: NoobMaster

osint.name: The Gang 3
osint.desc: Can you find out where the OG meetup point is? The flag is in the format n00bz{lat,long} with upto 3 decimal places, rounded. Continue where you left off... Note: Wikipedia can be wrong sometimes ;) Author: NoobMaster

osint.name: The Gang 4
osint.desc: Can you find more information about his flight? Time to close John Doe's case one and for all! Author: NoobMaster Note: Flag format: n00bz{DateOfFlight(DD/MM/YYYY)_FlightNumber_IATAairportCodeOfDeparture_IATAairportCodeofArrival_ACTUALtimeOfDeparture_ACTUALtimeOfArrival_GateofDeparture_AirplaneModel} Example: n00bz{26/06/2024_AA1337_DFW_SFO_13:37_15:51_32A_AirbusA319-400} Please use the above format to format your flag.

ppc.name: Back From Brazil
ppc.desc: I might have dropped a couple of eggs on my way to Brazil. Help me find the most optimal path back home. Author: Connor Chang

ppc.name: Sillygoose
ppc.desc: There's no way you can guess my favorite number, you silly goose. Author: Connor Chang

pwn.name: Think Outside the Box
pwn.desc: You cannot beat my Tic-Tac-Toe bot! If you do, you get a flag! Author: NoobMaster

rev.name: Brain
rev.desc: Help! A hacker said that this "language" has a flag but I can't find it! Author: NoobMaster

rev.name: FlagChecker
rev.desc: Why did the macros hide its knowledge? Because it didn't want anyone to "excel"! Note: char_21 is the SAME as char_22 Note 2: The correct flag has ALL LOWERCASE, NUMBERS, n00bz{] AND UNDERSCORES (There's two underscores in the entire flag) Author: NoobMaster

rev.name: Vacation
rev.desc: My friend told me they were going on vacation, but they sent me this weird PowerShell script instead of a postcard! Author: 0xBlue

web.name: File Sharing Portal
web.desc: Welcome to the file sharing portal! We only support tar files! Author: NoobMaster + NoobHacker

web.name: Focus on yourSELF
web.desc: Have you focused on yourself recently? Author: NoobHacker

web.name: Passwordless
web.desc: Tired of storing passwords? No worries! This super secure website is passwordless! Author: NoobMaster
